 Closure of addition of integers.  (Contributed by NM, 9-May-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 16-May-2014.)
statement: zaddcl $p |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M + N ) e. ZZ ) $.
